sentence: Trump's son, Donald Trump Jr., previously called her the Alabama Liz Cheney.? Brooks has been endorsed by Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA), Barry Moore (R-AL), Sens.
author: John Binder
title: Fundraiser for Alabama's Katie Britt Linked to Program that Sells U.S. Citizenship to Rich Foreign Nationals

sentence: One ad flashes a tweet from Donald Trump Jr. in 2021 back when his father still liked Mr. Brooks calling Ms. Britt the Alabama Liz Cheney. The share of voters with a favorable view of Ms. Britt dropped six points in the recent Alabama Daily News poll, compared with a survey in early May.
title: Scorned by Trump, Mo Brooks Rises in Alabama Senate Race
